mapper.select: SELECT t.wh_id, t.item_id, t.lot_id, t.photo_id, t.photo_type, t.path FROM photos T WHERE T.wh_id =#{wh_id} AND T.item_id =#{item_id} AND T.lot_id =#{lot_id}

select * from (select t.order_out_id, t.order_out_code from (SELECT oo.order_out_id, oo.order_out_code,oo.wave_id FROM order_out oo left join order_wave ow on ow.wave_id = oo.wave_id WHERE 1 = 1 and oo.customer_id = #{customer_id} and ow.wave_no not like 'X%' order by oo.create_at desc) t where rownum = 1
union all
select t.order_out_id, t.order_out_code from (SELECT oo.order_out_id, oo.order_out_code,oo.wave_id FROM order_out oo
WHERE 1 = 1 and oo.customer_id = #{customer_id}
order by oo.create_at desc) t where rownum = 1) where rownum = 1

select * from( select * from diy_order_out t where t.create_at > TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.customer_id = #{customer_id} order by to_number(substr(t.box_no,(instr(t.box_no,'-')+1))) desc) where rownum = 1
